markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bottled Air](/Equipment.aspx?ID=250)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 572 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Price** 320 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Appearing to be an ordinary corked glass bottle, this item contains a limitless supply of fresh air. You must uncork the bottle with an Interact action before you can activate it.

<document level="2" id="action-153" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Bottled Air
